basically consists of pictures company

information when a magazine or a

okay now let's move on to the next word

basically means the last possible date
to do something for example when you
were in school your teacher would always
give you a deadline to complete your
homework at work you have projects
projects that you have to complete by a
certain date
so that's your deadline well we often

the third
today's lesson is extension
extension actually extension and
deadline go together if you don't meet
your deadline you will need an extension
extension means to ask for more time to
complete something maybe a project at
work or homework at school extension
also means to move the deadline to a
time in the future by postponing the

with my computer it's just not booting
so if you run into some problems
it means you meet with some problems I
have heard a lot of my students say I
met some problems but that's completely
wrong rather you should say I ran into
some problem you should never say I met
some problems always say I ran into some
problems that's the right way
now let's review the last word
the fifth word in this section is
delayed so when something is delayed it
means it is late
opposite of delay days to be on time for
example your train is either delayed or
is on time your project was either

so when you put something off you leave
